name: Freshdesk [BETA]
description: Synchronize Contacts and Accounts with Freshdesk and Fetch Tickets

private_settings.name: domain
private_settings.title: Freshdesk Sub-Domain
private_settings.description: Your sub-domain in Freshdesk, e.g. if your domain is `hull.freshdesk.com`, enter just `hull` here.

private_settings.name: api_key
private_settings.title: API Key
private_settings.description: For details how to find your API Key, please refer to this [solution article](https://support.freshdesk.com/support/solutions/articles/215517) from Freshdesk.

private_settings.name: contact_synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: User Filter
private_settings.description: Synchronize Hull Users to Freshdesk Contacts when they are part of one of these segments.

private_settings.name: contact_lookup_attribute_email
private_settings.title: Email Lookup
private_settings.description: Define which attribute on the Hull User Profile shall be used to lookup Contacts in Freshdesk by their email.

private_settings.name: contact_lookup_attribute_unique_external_id
private_settings.title: Unique External ID Lookup
private_settings.description: Define which attribute on the Hull User Profile shall be used to lookup Contacts in Freshdesk by their unique external id.

private_settings.name: contact_attributes_outbound
private_settings.title: Outgoing Attributes
private_settings.description: Map the attributes of Hull Users to send.

private_settings.name: contact_attributes_inbound
private_settings.title: Incoming Fields
private_settings.description: Map the fields of Freshdesk Contacts to fetch.

private_settings.name: account_synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Account Filter
private_settings.description: Synchronize Hull Accounts to Freshdesk Companies when they are part of one of these segments.

private_settings.name: account_lookup_attribute_domain
private_settings.title: Domain Lookup
private_settings.description: Define which attribute on the Hull Account Profile shall be used to lookup Companies in Freshdesk by their domain.

private_settings.name: account_attributes_outbound
private_settings.title: Outgoing Attributes
private_settings.description: Map the attributes of Hull Accounts to send.

private_settings.name: account_filter_inbound_require_domain
private_settings.title: Require Domain for Incoming
private_settings.description: Skip Companies when importing data that do not have a domain in Freshdesk

private_settings.name: account_attributes_inbound
private_settings.title: Incoming Fields
private_settings.description: Map the fields of Freshdesk Companies to fetch.

settings_sections.title: Freshdesk Credentials
settings_sections.description: Authorize the Connector to access the Freshdesk API on your behalf using your personal access token.

settings_sections.title: Contacts
settings_sections.description: Define how to synchronize Hull Users with Freshdesk Contacts.

settings_sections.title: Companies
settings_sections.description: Define how to synchronize Hull Accounts with Freshdesk Companies.
